item.title: 2021 04 30 Splunk Introduction
item.description: What is Splunk-Enterprise splunk-enterprise | Guidance on deploying Splunk Enterprise on Azure with automated reference implementation This documentation provides detailed guidance to support the deployment of Splunk Enterprise on Azure in line with Splunk Validated Architectures and the following key priorities: High Availability Maximum Performance Security Scalability Background Customers blocked by lack of support for splunk enterprise on Azure BlackRock, Tesco, Adobe Key Issues No Azure-specific reference architecture or guidance
